English(en): Hello {playername}! It seems as though your fledgling cryptocurrency empire is really taking off!
The coin that you’ve created has become one of the hottest investments on the market, and your wealth is quickly growing.
I am the Occasionally Serviceable Cryptocurrency Acquisition Robot, but you can call me {robot}
I was produced by the company of a friendly businessman to help up-and-coming crypto billionaires like yourself manage your operations.
My creator actually stops by around here from time to time. I can’t wait for you to meet him!
Anyway, my protocol dictates that I must ask for the name of your cryptocurrency before I begin operations.
{coinname}, huh? That’s got a nice ring to it. We’re going to take this coin to the top of the charts!
Let me show you around!
This is your home base. You can use your computer to trade {coinname} for other cryptocurrencies.
You can also do some online shopping with your computer. I understand this is a favorite pastime for you humans.
I will handle all the record keeping of your business. You can check those in the bookshelf.
If you want to see how you’re doing, you can always peruse the records there.
If you need me to implement any new directives, you can make a note in the records and I will get right to it.
As you know, cryptocurrency is created through mining.
Since I’ve joined your team I’ve made a some great improvements to your {coinname} mining capabilities.
Let’s go check them out!
You can navigate by swiping left or right. Try swiping to the left to go check out the mines!
My user’s manual suggests that you can execute a swipe by dragging your finger from the left to right side of the screen.
Here we are. The mines. This is where you can usually find me hard at work mining {coinname}…
… or just resting my circuits from time to time.
This is your minecart. I will fill it up with the coins I mine until it is full, then you can come by and collect them.
It looks like the minecart is full now. You might as well collect those coins while we’re here.
Go ahead. Just tap on the minecart and collect the coins. I worked hard filling that thing up!
We just made our first 100 {coinname} together! I shall mark this occasion in my data logs for future auditing purposes.
If you wish, I will also allow you to join me in the mineshaft, where I solve puzzles to extract the {coinname}.
All you need to do is tap the mineshaft.
I can only do that from time to time, though. I need to recharge my lithium ion batteries afterwards.
Mining is hard work, buddy.
You can tap on me to spend your coins on upgrades for the minecart and the mineshaft that will allow me to mine even more efficiently!
Any good entrepreneur knows you need to spend money to make money. Invest wisely and you’ll be raking in the coins in no time!
Now let’s head back to base. I have someone for you to meet.
Just drag your finger from the right to the left side of the screen to swipe. Remember?
{robot}! Long time no see! How are you getting along with your new employer, {playername}?
{dog}! I haven’t seen you since I left your factory. Things are going swimmingly. I was just showing {playername} around their facilities.
{playername}, this is {dog}. He is the inventor of autonomous humanoid crypto-mining robots.
This, along with a number of other ventures has made him one of the wealthiest dogs on Earth…
and as you may have gathered, he is my creator. How it warms my capacitors to see him again!
Now now {robot}, there’s no need to talk me up like that.
I’m not some kibble-and-caviar kind of pup.
I’m much more down to hang out, bark at squirrels, maybe check out a few sick memes online. Ya know, Such Wow.
Well now that I’ve made it here {robot}, I need to ask you a question…
Have you seen my updog? I’ve been looking for it everywhere.
That does not compute sir. What is updog?
Nothing much homie!
I really gotta upgrade the humor components on these things.
Actually I came to see you {playername}. I need your help.
In my spare time I like to dabble in some space travel.
It’s a bit of a passion project for me.
I want to expand dogmanity out to the stars!
But it seems I now have some competition.
{stonks} has built his own rocket and is already on the moon!
{stonks}? Isn’t that the guy who made all that money trading stocks in internet companies?
Yes! And he thinks stocks are better than crypto! Get with the times man!
Unfortunately I’ve been too busy with my other companies to keep up with him.
{playername}, after watching how you’ve built up {coinname}, I think you’re the one for this job…
I am gifting you some of my rocketry resources, so you can check out what {stonks} is doing up there.
We haven’t quite worked out the technology to make it to the moon yet.
I’m just too busy right now, and I figured with all the {coinname} you’re amassing, you could fund the expedition.
So {playername} needs to take…
{coinname} TO THE MOOooOON!!!
Oh brother…
{robot}, you’ve been around my rocket facility, right? Why don’t you show {playername} the ropes. I’ll be back to check on you two later.
I’ll be back to check on you two later.
Right away sir!
{robot}, stop calling me sir!
{playername}, I trust you’ll be on the moon in no time. Back to business for me… bye now!
Yes sir!
… So…
… {playername}…
Let’s head over to your new rocket facility.
Don’t you know the drill by now? Drag your finger from the right side of the screen to the left side of the screen to swipe.
You humans truly perplex me sometimes.
Oh my…
Look at that rust bucket of a rocket.
My calculations do not predict a high probability of you making it to the moon in that thing.
I feel it deep in my software that you can do it, though.
I learned a few things about the operations of this place while working alongside {dog}.
This is your rocket lab.
This is where you can spend your {coinname} to conduct experiments on your rocket.
You’ve got a couple employees to assign to various research projects.
When an employee finishes their research, you can collect the knowledge they’ve gained.
This knowledge will increase the thrust of the rocket.
The more thrust we have, the higher we can go…
… so we’re going to need a lot of thrust.
{dog} was always talking about these things called {gemname_plural}.
He said that he had some secret experiments prepared that required them.
Apparently you can only find {gemname_plural} in the void of space.
So if you see a {gemname_singular} out there, pick it up so we can run those experiments!
Speaking of going up there…
To launch your rocket, just open the lid, and press the launch button.
You can open the lid by swiping up on it.
Just drag your finger from the bottom to the top of the button to open the lid.
Wait!
Don’t press it yet!!!
I don’t need you flying off. Close that thing so we can head back to base.
Are you still there?
Drag your finger from the top to the bottom of the lid to close it.
I can complete 500,000,000 calculations per second, but take your time {playername}.
Whenever you are ready, drag your finger from the left to the right side of the screen to swipe us back to base.
You’ve just about seen it all.
Remember that I, and the rest of your employees will be hard at work even when you’re sleeping.
In fact, most things will have timers next to them showing when they are ready for use.
Be on the lookout for those!
Things will be much more efficient around here with your guidance, however.
Be sure to check in often!
Good luck, {playername}!
{playername}! You really did it! I had all the faith that you could make it to the moon!
Unfortunately, I wasn’t expecting you to make it there so fast.
I’m working as quickly as possible to get a moon base set up, so you can continue your operations there.
It isn’t quite ready yet, though.
In the meantime, why don’t you keep upgrading your rocket and collecting resources?
We might need them if we plan on figuring out what {stonks} is up to….
Waaaaaah!! Did I hear someone speak my name?
{dog}!
It’s been too long. I haven’t seen you since the billionaire’s conference in Saint-Tropez.
{stonks}!
What kind of dastardly plans are you harboring? Why are you on the moon?
Now now, {dog}, let’s not be too presumptuous.
You’ll just have to get in your rocket and come meet me up there.
Oh wait… I nearly forgot…
You don’t have any rockets that can make it to the moon!
That may be so… but {playername} does.
Oh really? And who is this {playername} might I ask?
They’re only the next crypto billionaire in the making…
and they’re going to stop you from doing whatever you’re up to.
You don’t say? Well…
It’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance {playername}.
I look forward to your visit.
Until then I need to get back to counting my huge piles of MONEY!
Until next time, {dog} and {playername}.
Ugh literal piles of money? Doesn’t he know everything is digital now?
I may need to recalibrate my sensors but I did not get a good vibe from that guy.
Yeah he’s a total creep… stuck in 1999.
{playername}, you keep working on that rocket. I’m gonna get your moonbase ready.
Let’s show {stonks} the power of crypto!
